body:
After checking example packages and the [docs](http://software.llnl.gov/spack/spack.html) I could not find a clear definition of the meaning `~` vs `-` vs `+` for _variants_.

What I am trying to build is a package depending always on mpi (easy) but as an option on `hdf5` or alternatively `hdf5+mpi` (for parallel i/o "aggregation"). Now I am confused if I should also add `hdf5~mpi` or even `hdf5-mpi` :-)
title: Variants: Meaning of ~ + -
